item.title: Hide Variables
item.description: If you’re working on a complex model there are often variables that need to exist in the model that are needed to solve your model, but are not that interesting. Worse - sometimes these variables make your graph unreadable because they’re on a really different scale (e.g., the number of susceptible individuals in a disease that never reaches a very high level in a population). As of wodin 0.3.0, you can now select variables to show from below the editor, on the Code tab:
